strong.span: GOVERNOR DECREES ALL VT SCHOOLS CLOSED FROM 3/18 - 4/6 (Minimum)

div.p: On March 15 at 3:20 p.m., Governor Scott announced that a statewide school closure will occur no later than Wednesday, March 18, 2020. The purpose of this message is to provide you an update of the actions the Orleans Central Supervisory Union will take as it relates to Governor Scott's School Closure announcement.
On Monday, March 16th all OCSU students will have a 2-hour delay so that staff can begin to prepare for the continuity of education and services during the closure.
To continue reading, click the button below.

First and foremost, student attendance at school on Monday and Tuesday is a family decision. For these two days, OCSU attendance procedures will be waived, and no student will be penalized for not attending.

Our administrative team has been working all weekend and will continue working with our employees to plan for the support of our students and families during the closure of school. To be clear, our primary areas of focus include the well-being of our students, families and employees. The plan that we are developing will strive to encompass all of the components that Governor Scott has referenced in his statement/press conference.

Thank you for your patience and flexibility as we move forward. You can expect regular communication from us so that we are keeping you informed. We are doing all we can to make sure these priorities are taken care of to the best of our abilities.
Again, all students will have a 2 hour delay tomorrow.

p.style: font: 400 13.33px/1.656 Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: left; color: #222222; text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; word-spacing: 0px; white-space: normal; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;

p.style: font: 400 13.33px/1.656 Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: left; color: #222222; text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; word-spacing: 0px; white-space: normal; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;

p.span: Good afternoon, this is Bev Davis. On March 15 at 3:20 p.m., Governor Scott

span.style: color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

color: #1155cc; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: underline; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

a.span: announced that a statewide school closure

span.style: color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

p.span: will occur no later than Wednesday, March 18, 2020. The purpose of this message is to provide you an update of the actions the Orleans Central Supervisory Union will take as it relates to Governor Scott's School Closure announcement.

p.style: font: 400 13.33px/1.38 Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: left; color: #222222; text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; word-spacing: 0px; white-space: normal; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;

span.style: color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

p.span: On Monday, March 16th all OCSU students will have a 2-hour late start so that staff can begin to prepare for the continuity of education and services during the closure.

p.style: font: 400 13.33px/1.38 Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: left; color: #222222; text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 0pt; margin-bottom: 0pt; word-spacing: 0px; white-space: normal; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;

span.style: color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

p.span: All staff are expected to report to work at their usual time per the governor’s order.

br.style: text-align: left; color: #222222; text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; font-family: Arial,Helvetica,sans-serif; font-size: 13.33px; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; word-spacing: 0px; white-space: normal;

p.style: font: 400 13.33px/1.38 Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: left; color: #222222; text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; word-spacing: 0px; white-space: normal; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;

span.style: color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

p.style: font: 400 13.33px/1.38 Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: left; color: #222222; text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; word-spacing: 0px; white-space: normal; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;

span.style: color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

p.span: Governor Scott’s directive will task local districts with three key components to support the State response:

p.style: font: 400 13.33px/1.38 Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: left; color: #222222; text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; word-spacing: 0px; white-space: normal; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;

span.style: color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

p.span: Food and special needs services for children;

p.style: font: 400 13.33px/1.38 Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: left; color: #222222; text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; word-spacing: 0px; white-space: normal; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;

span.style: color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

p.span: Collaborating with the state to provide childcare options for healthcare workers and others essential to the response; and

p.style: font: 400 13.33px/1.38 Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: left; color: #222222; text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; word-spacing: 0px; white-space: normal; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;

span.style: color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

p.span: Systems for ensuring maintenance of education during the initial dismissal; and a continuing education plan if schools are dismissed for an extended period.

p.style: font: 400 13.33px/1.38 Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: left; color: #222222; text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; word-spacing: 0px; white-space: normal; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;

span.style: color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

p.span: No student is required to be in school Monday or Tuesday, if their parents or guardians would prefer to keep them home.

p.style: font: 400 13.33px/1.38 Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; text-align: left; color: #222222; text-transform: none; text-indent: 0px; letter-spacing: normal; text-decoration: none; margin-top: 12pt; margin-bottom: 12pt; word-spacing: 0px; white-space: normal; font-size-adjust: none; font-stretch: normal;

span.style: color: #000000; font-family: Arial; font-size: 11pt; font-style: normal; font-variant: normal; font-weight: 400; text-decoration: none; vertical-align: baseline; white-space: pre-wrap; background-color: transparent;

p.span: Education professionals should report to work as scheduled to assist in these efforts during this period of school dismissal. Districts are directed to follow workplace hygiene guidance issued by the Vermont Department of Health.
